thread.title: Michael Riggs
thread.title_full: Monaco Rare Coins reviewed by Michael Riggs

author: Michael Riggs
title: Michael Riggs
text:
Initially I wasn't sure Monaco was was the supplier of the type of coins I could afford. Brad quickly changed my mind. His professionalism was outstranding and the rare coins were awesome. Monaco is a trusted source for quality rare coins.
Thank you for your dedication and class.
